chargeHist.descr: Physical Abuse of Elder Person - Intentionally Cause Bodily Harm

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

9:10 AM Defendant Janice M Petri in court.  Attorney Laura Ann Walker Esq in court for Janice M Petri.  Prosecuting attorney Jennifer Tanck-Adams in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter: Sara Rogan. Defense request jury trial and final pre-trial. State indicates she spoke to victim yesterday and puts the new offer on the record. State revokes offer at this time as trial is being set. 
Court holds colloquy with defendant about rejecting offer. State will file something to consolidate these cases as well as filing an other acts. 
BTC: Matter set for trial and final pre-trial. All pre-trial motions to be filed to final pre-trial.
Final pre-trial scheduled for March 6, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Jury trial scheduled for March 21, 2023 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial on March 21, 2023 at 01:30 pm.
Final pre-trial on March 6, 2023 at 09:00 am.

8:46 AM Prosecuting attorney Jennifer Tanck-Adams in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Janice M Petri in court.  Attorney Laura Ann Walker Esq in court for Janice M Petri. Court Reporter Sara Rogan. 
Defense indicates there was a modification on the offer, requests another status date to make a decision. 
BTC: Matter set over.
Status conference scheduled for October 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on October 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions: No contact with 1517 Augusta St, Racine WI 53402. No contact with the victim J.D.S and L.M (person, property, residence or family). State objects to warrant being stayed and gives statement as to why. 
BTC: No appearance, Bench/Arrest Warrant requested/ordered, bond forfeited. STAYED 48 HOURS.
